name: Jake Ryan
summary: I am a fourth-year student at the University of Waterloo, pursuing a degree in Computer Science with a minor in music. I have a passion for software development and have experience working with a variety of technologies. I am a quick learner and am always looking for new challenges.

experience.details:
• Worked on the Google Chrome team to develop new features for the browser.
• Wrote and tested code in C++ and JavaScript.
• Collaborated with other engineers to design and implement new features.

• Worked on the Facebook Messenger team to develop new features for the app.
• Wrote and tested code in Java and Python.
• Collaborated with other engineers to design and implement new features.
